casebody.data:
GOOD HOPE
v.
NCDHHS. No. 57A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 11, 2006. Maureen D. Murray, Susan M. Fradenburg, Greensboro, William W. Stewart, Jr., Raleigh, for Good Hope Health System. C. Winston Gilchrist, Lillington, for Town of Lillington. R. Marcus Lodge, for NCDHHS. Noah H. Huffstetler, III, Wallace C. Hollowell, III, Benjamin N. Thompson, K. Edward Greene, Kathleen A. Naggs, Raleigh, Denise M. Gunter, Winston-Salem, for Betsy Johnson Regional Hosp. S. Todd Hemphill, Diane E. Ricketts, Raleigh, for Amisub of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th day of July 2006 by Respondent for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Respondent (NCDHHS) shall have up to and including the 7th day of August 2006 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 11th day of July 2006."
